thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' daughter critical after harrowing accident
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears' daughter critical after harrowing accident

author: Sara McGinnis
title: Jamie Lynn Spears' daughter critical after harrowing accident
text:
by Sara McGinnis posted in Celebrities Prayers, well-wishes and thoughts are needed today for the Spears family. Maddie Aldridge, the daughter of Jamie Lynn Spears, is currently in stable but critical condition following a terrifying accident. The 8-year-old, whose aunt is Britney Spears, was involved in an ATV crash in Kentwood, La., on Sunday....

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
